story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_0100_10:
It’s so reassuring to have one of Alola’s guardian
deities with me!
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hahaha! It seems you haven’t noticed!
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_0300_10:
This Tapu Koko is not the guardian deity of
Melemele. I can tell!
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_0500_10:
This Tapu Koko showed up to protect the island
of Pasio!
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_0600_10: And my grandson was deemed worthy.
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_0700_10: Old Hala is proud to be your grandfather!
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_0900_10: I see. I’m curious about this “equipment.”
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_1000_10: Could it be related to all these disturbances?
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_1100_10:
For now, let us celebrate you and Hau allying with
these new partner Pokémon.
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You have been deemed worthy by Pokémon that
could be the guardian deities of Pasio!
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Yep! We have to work together to protect the
peace on Pasio!
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Although, I’m surprised Tapu Fini has shown up
as well...
story_alola_01_12000/2401_1001_1700_10: Could it be the other tapu are also here?
